name: Downtown Mafia: Gang Wars
description: Addictive text-based Mafia MMO RPG where you team up with other players to wage Gang Wars, Turf Wars, Boss Fights, Hire Mercs, Hit-List your enemies, buy weapons, vehicles and equipments, City-based Missions, TOURNAMENTS and much more..
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Direct X compatible
